pub async fn attach_role_policy(
    client: &iamClient,
    role: &Role,
    policy: &Policy,
) -> Result<AttachRolePolicyOutput, SdkError<AttachRolePolicyError>> {
    client
        .attach_role_policy()
        .role_name(role.role_name.as_ref().unwrap())
        .policy_arn(policy.arn.as_ref().unwrap())
        .send()
        .await
}
